co2-calculation: directly from study IP production cultivation 35.8 gCO2eq/kg + carbon footprint to point of sale large farm business and waste during transportation = 15.6 gCO2eq/kg = 51.4 gCO2eq/kg (farm to retail)
references: Schäfer & Blanke 2012. Farming and marketing system affects carbon and water footprint - a case study using Hokkaido pumpkin. Journal of Cleaner Production 28. Page 117, Table 7
calculation-process-documentation: cradle to retail, in study disposal equals carbon sequestration by plant
name: Kürbis
